data.title: Basler Zeitung APK Download for Android
data.meta_description: Download Basler Zeitung APK (12.3.5) for Android for free. News, facts & background from Basel.
data.text:
News, facts & background from Basel.

With the news app of the Basler Zeitung you are always informed about the most important things. The Basler Zeitung is not only the newspaper for Basel, but also offers you news from all over Switzerland and the world. Strong in politics, business, sports, entertainment and culture. Whether regional, Switzerland-wide or worldwide, with us you will find well-researched articles, insightful analyses, exciting background stories, international reports and regional articles.

Your advantages with the BaZ News App:

1. Everything in one news app: Quality journalism from Basel, Switzerland and the world.

2. Push notifications: You can choose the topics on which you want to receive push notifications.

3. Save article: If you would like to save an article for later, you can save it in the bookmarks with one click.

4. Read offline: Once loaded, content can also be read without an internet connection.

5. Gift Items: Subscribers can give away up to 10 items per month.

6. E-Paper: Do you want to switch from the news app to the newspaper layout? One click opens the Basler Zeitung e-paper, the digital version of the daily newspaper.

7. Agenda: Find current events, concerts, theater performances, parties and movies in our digital calendar.

8. carte blanche: With a valid subscription, you can not only access all the content on the app, you can also easily discover the exclusive offers and advantages of the "carte blanche" customer card.

More than just news

In addition to the latest news, great research, well-founded comments and background reports from Switzerland and around the world, you will find the most important stories and news about Basel in our app.

Our editors not only write, but also regularly produce great podcasts from the fields of politics, sports, business and society. And in our extensive blog collection you will be provided with tips on living, parenting and finances, among other things.

Register and benefit

By creating a user account, you benefit from various advantages. You can save items on your watch list or define whether the app appears in the light layout or in dark mode. You can also choose from our numerous newsletters by logging in and deepen your interests with a subscription.

It pays to become a subscriber

With a subscription, you benefit from full access to all stories - from extensive background research, to long reads prepared with great attention to detail, to exclusive stories.

The Basler Zeitung app, on the other hand, is free to download. Existing newspaper subscribers also have unlimited access to all content. All you have to do is set up a login with your customer number.

Downloading articles, multimedia content and streaming TV channels may incur additional connection costs. Check with your cell phone provider.

Link to the privacy policy and terms of use:

General terms and conditions: terms and conditions.bazonline.ch

Data protection declaration: privacypolicy.bazonline.ch
